Recommendations.Title: Report a missed bin collection
Key Strengths: Direct link to report a missing bin collection
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link is the most direct and specific option for reporting a missed household bin collection.

Recommendations.Title: Request a new bin
Key Strengths: Direct link to request a new bin
Relevance to the customer's need for council information
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link allows customers to request new bins if one or more are missing, which could be beneficial when addressing customer needs.

Recommendations.Title: Caerphilly County Borough Council
Key Strengths: General information hub for the council
Recommendations.Reasoning: Though not specific to 'council customer information', this link provides access to various services that may be relevant for customers.

Recommendations.Title: Report a missed commercial waste collection
Key Strengths: Allows commercial customers to report missed collections
Recommendations.Reasoning: While not directly related to household waste, this resource caters to commercial waste and missing collection reports, which could still be helpful.

Recommendations.Title: Waste collection - Caerphilly County Borough
Recommendations.Reasoning: Though not as specific, this resource may provide additional information or services regarding waste collection for customers.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: The search results provided a mix of direct and indirect links related to council customer information. However, the most relevant options mainly focused on household and commercial waste.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: While some of the recommended resources are not directly related to specific customer needs, they still offer useful information that could address various inquiries.
